locations.name: Your Dorm Room
locations.brief_description:
Your Dorm Room
Exits: North -> Study Lounge, West -> Coffee Shop
locations.long_description:
You wake up in your dorm room, heart pounding. Your USB drive, laptop charger, and lucky mug are all missing. You need to find them and return here before the deadline.

Exits:
- North -> Study Lounge
- West -> Coffee Shop

locations.name: Study Lounge
locations.brief_description:
Study Lounge
Exits: North -> Friend's Condo, South -> Your Dorm Room, West -> Robarts Library
locations.long_description:
This is the study lounge you and your friend always sit at. There are outlets everywhere, and the couches look very familiar.

Exits:
- North -> Friend's Condo
- South -> Your Dorm Room
- West -> Robarts Research Library

locations.name: Friend's Condo
locations.brief_description:
Friend's Condo
Exits: South -> Study Lounge
locations.long_description:
You arrive at your friend's condo. The hallway is quiet. A welcome mat lies in front of the door, slightly out of place.

Exits:
- South -> Study Lounge

locations.name: Robarts Research Library
locations.brief_description:
Robarts Library
Exits: East -> Study Lounge, South -> Coffee Shop
locations.long_description:
You step into Robarts Research Library. The second floor corner desks are quiet and dimly lit-exactly where you studied last night.

Exits:
- East -> Study Lounge
- South -> Coffee Shop

locations.name: Coffee Shop
locations.brief_description:
Coffee Shop
Exits: North -> Robarts Library, East -> Your Dorm Room
locations.long_description:
The coffee shop smells like espresso. Near the counter is a wall of rental lockers. You suddenly remember your lucky mug.

Exits:
- North -> Robarts Research Library
- East -> Your Dorm Room

items.name: usb drive
items.description: Your USB drive—the only copy of your project. You can’t submit without it.

items.name: laptop charger
items.description: Your laptop charger. Without it, your battery won’t survive the final fixes.

items.name: lucky mug
items.description: Your lucky U of T mug. It’s been with you through every all-nighter.

items.name: password note
items.description: A small note hidden under the welcome mat. It reads: 'Do you still remember the day little you wished to come to U of T?'

items.name: locker
items.description: A rental locker. Something important might be inside, but it needs a password.

items.name: photo album
items.description: A heavy photo album on your desk. It contains photos from your childhood and early visits to the University of Toronto.

items.name: phone
items.description:
Your phone. It has your friend's messages and your Instagram feed. You might find clues here. 
New message from your friend: 'Hey, I found a charger at our usual spot in the *study lounge*. Is it yours?'
Instagram photo #1: A blurry shot near your friend's condo. Something small is on the table.
Instagram photo #2: A quiet corner desk on the 2nd floor of *Robarts Library* and lap top with a USB plugged in.
Instagram photo #3: A laptop at the *coffee shop* only has a mouse plugged in
